snippet: A boy died in the Bronx after being found unconscious in his bed early Saturday morning, and in Brooklyn a man was charged with assaulting his 2-year-old stepdaughter.
abstract: New York City police are investigating death of 3-year-old boy Poseidon Quinones in Bronx after his grandmother found him unconscious in his bed; separate investigation is being conducted in assault of 2-year-old Thaiya Spruill-Smith by her stepfather, incident that left her on life support.
lead_paragraph: A boy died in the Bronx after being found unconscious in his bed early Saturday morning, and in Brooklyn a man was charged with assaulting his 2-year-old stepdaughter.

headline.main: Police Examine Death of a Boy and an Attack on a Girl
headline.print_headline: Police Examine Death of a Boy and an Attack on a Girl

keywords.value: Lincoln Medical and Mental Health Center
keywords.name: organizations
